snippet: People in Australia and New Zealand consume more marijuana and amphetamines than anyone else in the world, research in The Lancet has concluded.
lead_paragraph: People in Australia and New Zealand consume more marijuana and amphetamines than anyone else in the world, research in The Lancet has concluded.

headline.main: Marijuana Use Most Rampant in Australia, Study Finds
headline.print_headline: Marijuana Use Most Rampant in Australia, Study Finds
